removeAllNonPersistentWarningPanel.title: Remove all measures
removeAllNonPersistentWarningPanel.message: Are you sure you want to remove all the measures ?

notifyinitial: Select an item to measure using filters if needed
notifyrepeatitem: Select another geometry to create a new measure or validate to exit
notifyrepeatitempt: Select another point to measure or validate to exit
notifyitem: Select another item to measure between, choose repeat mode or validate to exit
notifyitempt: Select another point to measure between
notifyrepeatbtwnmultimeasfirstsel: Select two geometries to create a new measure or validate to exit
notifyrepeatbtwmultimeassecondsel: Select another geometry to complete the measure or validate to exit
notifyrepeatbetween: Select another geometry to create a new measure or validate to exit
notifyrepeatbetweenpt: Select another point to create a new measure or validate to exit
notifybetween: Choose repeat mode or validate to exit
notify3pointsangle: Select a point to measure angle
notify3pointscircle: Select a point to measure circle
notify3points: Select a point to measure angle or circle
notifythickness: Select a surface to measure thickness
notifyMinDistanceFullMemoryFailure: Failed to compute minimum distance, reached memory limit
notifyRequestedMinDistanceFullMemoryFail: Failed to compute requested minimum distance, reached memory limit
notifyFullMemoryFailure: Data could not be loaded, reached memory limit
notifyPartialStructureFailure: Partial data selected, measure computation cannot be completed
